text: @NYGovCuomo It's now May 10th and @NYGovCuomo starts to protect seniors and staff in #nursinghomes. We should have protected the most vulnerable from the beginning. Very sad and poor leadership. #COVID19 #coronavirus #Lockdown #quarantine #NewYork #NYC
